casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Keith Kennard CARTER. No. 483P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Chris Z. Sinha, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of November 2007 by Defendant for court appointed experts pursuant to N.C. Gen.Stat. Sec. 8C-1 Rule 706:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2007."
